events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system identified this case as a refund issue based on the customer's request about returning the product.
Your refund request has been assigned to our customer support agent team for immediate assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 54321XYZ. The jacket is brand new and still inside the original sealed packaging.
Thanks for the information! We will initiate the refund once we receive the returned jacket. A prepaid shipping label will be emailed to you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt response and clear instructions on how to proceed with the return.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Once the jacket is received, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
We are checking in to confirm you have successfully shipped the jacket back using the provided label. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the jacket was sent back yesterday via the prepaid label. I will wait for your confirmation of the refund.
The refund has been successfully processed to your original payment method. You should see the amount reflected shortly.
We hope you received your refund without issues. Please contact us if you have any other questions or concerns.
This case is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation, and we hope to serve you again in the future.
